xwikidoc.title: The Order of Traveling Magi
xwikidoc.content:
The Order of Traveling Magi is a secretive order of mages which operates across Kinergh. Its mission is to maintain a watch on the evil forces of the north and other threats to the overall welfare of the free demi-human peoples of the Kinergh. Originally the order was made up of certain Cardolan master wizards, and was thus mainly human. During the fall of the Cardolan Empire most of its ancient magical guilds and orders were destroyed or broke up. The Order's leaders recruited both human and non-human members starting at this time. They also salvaged, hid, destroyed, and often preserved many powerful items, books, etc which were part of the Empire's magical legacy. Several dragons joined the order at this time and they have been particularly influential in the centuries since.
